_header: To say something is mine entent
Subjects: Cecilia, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Cecilia, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[T]o say sume thing is myne ententof sanct cecile þe fare
                    & gent…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…Of þis varld þat we ma twynebut schame det or dedly
                    syne
